Pre-Game Insights: India have kicked off the tournament with strong performances winning their first three games quite convincingly.
Rohit Sharma has been in sensational form and is leading the batting order, whereas Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav have been the key bowlers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India are set to face Bangladesh in their fourth match of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023, at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Pune on Thursday.
Others: The odds for this Cricket World Cup 2023 match are as follows: Team Betting odds - India 1.10, Bangladesh 7.60.
